edu.ncsu.csc.utilities

Class GitDiffController

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc.utilities.GitDiffController

  • public class GitDiffController
extends java.lang.Object
    The controller class designed to encapsulate all mechanisms for the Git tree traversal and diff operations.
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Chris Stroud (clstroud@ncsu.edu)

    • Method Detail

      • loadRepository

        public void loadRepository()
        Attempts to load the repository based on the previously-provided filePath

      • getCommitListFromCommit

        public java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getCommitListFromCommit(java.lang.String sha1)
        Constructs a Linked Map of type SHA-1 (key), Message (value). The contained values represent all commits (in order) starting from the "oldest-ancestor" commit (indicated by the given hash), up until the most recent commit on that branch.
        Parameters:
        sha1 - The SHA-1 of the ancestor commit
        Returns:
        Linked Map of commit data

      • getCommitForHash

        private org.eclipse.jgit.revwalk.RevCommit getCommitForHash(java.lang.String hash)
        Returns a commit matching the given SHA-1 hash
        Parameters:
        hash - The commit's SHA-1 hash
        Returns:
        The commit revision instance

      • performDiff

        public void performDiff(java.lang.String baseObjId,
               java.lang.String newObjId)
        The driver of the diffing processing between the two given commit hashes. If you were looking for the party, this is where it's at.
        Parameters:
        baseObjId - The base commit hash
        newObjId - The new commit hash

      • processAsJavaFile

        private static boolean processAsJavaFile(java.lang.String path,
                        DiffSession diffSession)
        Determines whether the file at the given path should be processed as a Java file or not.
        Parameters:
        path - The path to the file
        diffSession - The current diff session
        Returns:
        Whether the file should be treated as a Java file

      • oldLinesAffectedByDiff

        private static java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> oldLinesAffectedByDiff(java.lang.String blob,
                                                       java.lang.String diffOutput)
        Parses a commit diff blob and retrieves the lines affected by changes in the old file (left side).
        Parameters:
        blob - The commit blob
        diffOutput - The output from the diff operation
        Returns:
        A list of modified lines

      • newLinesAffectedByDiff

        private static java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> newLinesAffectedByDiff(java.lang.String blob,
                                                       java.lang.String diffOutput)
        Parses a commit diff blob and retrieves the lines affected by changes in the new file (right side).
        Parameters:
        blob - The commit blob
        diffOutput - The output from the diff operation
        Returns:
        A list of modified lines

      • diffSingleCommits

        private java.util.List<org.eclipse.jgit.diff.DiffEntry> diffSingleCommits(java.lang.String oldHash,
                                                                java.lang.String newHash)
        Receives two commit hashes, then performs a diff on their "descendant" commit trees.
        Parameters:
        oldHash - The base commit SHA-1
        newHash - The new commit SHA-1
        Returns:
        All DiffEntries computed between those commits

      • getPlotCommits

        public org.eclipse.jgit.revplot.PlotCommitList<org.eclipse.jgit.revplot.PlotLane> getPlotCommits(java.lang.String path)
        Given a commit SHA-1, this returns the commit list from the given resource path.
        Parameters:
        path - The resource path
        Returns:
        The list of plot commits

      • fetchBlob

        private java.lang.String fetchBlob(org.eclipse.jgit.lib.ObjectId id,
                         java.lang.String path)
        Fetches a blob from the given commit object identifier at the given file path. Essentially reconstructs the file at the snapshot in time of the commit.
        Parameters:
        id - The commit identifier
        path - The path of the file for which we need the blob.
        Returns:
        A String representation of the file

      • prepareTreeParser

        private static org.eclipse.jgit.treewalk.AbstractTreeIterator prepareTreeParser(org.eclipse.jgit.lib.Repository repository,
                                                               java.lang.String ref)
                                                                         throws java.io.IOException,
                                                                                org.eclipse.jgit.errors.MissingObjectException,
                                                                                org.eclipse.jgit.errors.IncorrectObjectTypeException
        Prepares a new object tree iterator from the given ref and repository.
        Parameters:
        repository - The local repository housing the ref
        ref - The ref from which the iterator will walk
        Returns:
        The tree iterator
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an IOException occurs
        org.eclipse.jgit.errors.MissingObjectException - If a MissingObjectException occurs
        org.eclipse.jgit.errors.IncorrectObjectTypeException - If an IncorrectObjectTypeException occurs

        Parameters:
